Name: The Red Knight
Description: The Black Knight is as tough as they come. Though arrogant, he is quite skilled, and a brave knight from his kingdom. Though many consider him as an antagonist, he was once recruited to be a member of the round table by King Arthur himself. He promptly refused and even challenged the king himself to combat leading to his utter demise. The founder saw his plight and brought him to the game show as a way to prove himself once more.
